game.name: Augmented Fear
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Augmented Fear is a horror puzzle game set in a dark and oppressive cyberpunk universe. Trapped in a mysterious district, you must find a way out and survive against aggressive creatures. Use augmented reality to uncover the secrets hidden within. Every death is just one step closer to the truth.
